revised_title: Diagnosis of Diamines: A Study of Poly-Ammonias
tldr: The author, A.W. Hofmann, investigates the properties of poly-ammonias, specifically focusing on diamines. By examining the formation of salts and the reactions of ammonia compounds, Hofmann determines the atomicity of diamines and provides a method for diagnosing them. This research contributes to the understanding of ammonia derivatives and their chemical properties.
